title: Vaccination Education Design Utilizing 3D Virtual Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Provides 3D simulation-based education to overcome physical constraints of real laboratory environments. Strengthens learners' instructional design dynamics and technology utilization skills

learning_goals: Standard vaccination procedures (simulation) can be performed with over 80% accuracy in a 3D virtual environment.
Educational design competencies across diverse scenarios (age groups, injection sites, adverse reaction responses) can be measured using an assessment rubric.
Learner-tailored feedback reports can be generated by analyzing simulation data.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
